data.name: House of Maids
data.detailed_description:
Game Story

"House of Maids" visual novel tells a story about a young photographer who appears on a remote island for a photo session with a smoking hot model but instead discovers a secret private mansion inhabited by sexy housemaids and their strict Mistress, who is absolutely not happy to have an outsider in the house full of horny servants.


Be in control of your adventure: follow different story paths, complete missions, and win the girl's loyalty. There're all kinds of sexy chicks in the game who are available for interactions and romance as the story unfolds. Some are silly and playful, others are calm and intelligent. There're dominant ladies who are all about discipline, and some very submissive babes to have fun with.

Game Choices

Explore the island and the private mansion, romance a multitude of hot girls, and dive deep into a lustful story full of sex and fetish fantasies. Meaningful choices are everywhere: choose places to go on the island, what and how to say in dialogues, choose options during photo shoots, and types of sex, that you'd like to have with your partners.




Every choice counts and leads to several different endings. Leave the island as a happy tourist, meet the love of your life, go to jail for being stubborn or turn yourself into an alpha-male and become the Master of your own harem - it's all up to you!


Gameplay features:

  • High-quality animated characters
  • Interactive sex scenes with various girls
  • Kinky BDSM scenes
  • Photo shoots with different girls
  • Branching dialogues with characters
  • Meaningful choices which define the adventure
  • Multiple endings based on player choices
  • Unlockable CG art gallery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted in the game are over the age of 18.
The game contains content not appropriate for all ages: nudity, sex scenes, strong language, and mild violence.
